about_the_game:
A unique RPG game with appealing characters and where your actions have consequences!

You are Rebecca, an engineer who has had her technology stolen. Your mission: take it back.

Travel over the world in search of objects and characters that will help you in your mission, through a universe full of challenges!

Ho, yes... And... Rebecca can reverse the flow of time...


(The .gif compression slightly degraded the rendering quality.)

Features

  • Intelligent NPCs: they move, talk, never say the same thing twice, notice what you are doing, etc.
  • Dozens of mini-games, each more addictive than the next.
  • Original graphics and an unforgettable soundtrack.
  • An adjustable difficulty, for noobs and pro ;)
  • 6 to 8 possible endings!

Your actions have consequences

- You treat John like shit -> He won't like you.

- You forget to water your plant -> It dies.
- You hug someone while being half-naked -> ERECT... Hm... Refusal of the hug.


(The .gif compression slightly degraded the rendering quality.)

- You want to play it "psychopath"? -> … Yes… It is possible…

Warning

Reversed Rebecca is not a horror game. But the player has every right to try to play trash, or worse… This will inevitably have consequences. Be ready to face them.



(The .gif compression slightly degraded the rendering quality.)
